template.h3: Flow 1: Create your products database in a clear and structured way
template.p: Create your products and use attributes and attribute values to structure and classify them

ol.li: Open the products menu (from the sales or inventory application) and create a new product. Choose well your name to keep a good structure among all products; Ex: name of the bottle - domain - vintage
Assign attributes and attribute values to this product
Give it a sales price
Choose the right Unit of Measure (bottle) and create different packagings (case)

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: Demo attributes and attribute values have been added but feel free to add as many attributes and attribute values as you would like!
Find here documentation about product packagings: Configure Product Packagings

template.h3: Flow 2: Manage leads and client relationship with the CRM App and create your first sale order with the Sales App
template.p: Track potential clients and manage interactions effectively.

ol.li: Open the CRM App, create a new lead for a particular wishing to order a large quantity of different wines and assign the lead to a team member
Log meetings, calls, and emails directly in the CRM. Use the pipeline to track the progress of each lead (e.g., New ‚Üí Qualified ‚Üí Proposition ‚Üí Won)
Once your lead has shown interest, generate a quotation in the Sales App offering your different wines
Add the products to the quotation and send it by email to your customer
Once your customer confirmed the quotation, you can transfor it into a sale order and...voila!

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: To speed up the creation of the quotation use a quotation template.

ol.li: Open your website, add different blocks to build the perfect website. Get your clients to know you, your offer and the events you organize
The shop page will automatically showcase your different products

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: The Ecommerce categories will help you structure and organize your online catalog making it easier for customers to browse and find what they need.
The attributes defined on the products will allow your customers to filter on different attribute values to refine their search.

template.h3: Flow 4: ... or in your shop with the Point of Sale App

ol.li: Select the customer
Add the products to the cart
Select any of the payment methods and proceed to payment

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: For a more structured point of sale catalog, create different Point of Sale categories. These can be defined on your product forms.

template.h3: Flow 5: Organize events around wine with our Events App
template.p: Organize sparkling events in your shop!

ol.li: Open the Events App
Configure your next event. Wheter it's an oenology class, a wine tasting or a special event, configure the tickets, pricing, communication around it,...
Write an attracting description
Publish it on your website
On your website, your customers will now be able to buy tickets for your different events and you will be able to manage the participants from the Events App

template.h3: Flow 6: Manage the replenishment of your products with the Purchase App and your stock levels with the Inventory App
template.p: Track your purchases and manage your stock levels

ol.li: You recently did a tour of the vineyards in France or in Italy and you wish to keep a trace of your recent purchases? Record them in the purchase app
This will allow you to plan your receptions and know when your stock will be replenished with your novelties or best sellers
Once you have received your products store them in your shop or warehouse
